channel.title: proxy on Empty
channel.description: Recent content in proxy on Empty

item.title: [CTFZone 2022] ProxyHell
item.description: I do like proxy-related challenges, so I decided to share my solution for the CTFZone ProxyHell challenge. Despite it wasn’t a hard task, only 3 teams solved it in the end. Initial observing We have a docker-compose.yml file with 5 images - apache, varnish, nginx-ldap, nginx, openldap. If we do grep -r flag, we will see that the flag is within the index.html page: app/index.html:<h1>CTFZone{Test_flag}</h1>. If we try to access the root of the server – we will get a 403 forbidden error:
